transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji. Hello. Haan ji sir namaskar.
Customer: Namaskar.
Executive: OESM deal se OESM deal se baat kar rahe hain.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Sir main Satyajit Tiwari baat kar. Sir main Satyajit Tiwari baat.
Customer: Awaaz nahi aa rahi sahi.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Haan ji awaaz aa rahi hai. Haan ab bolo.
Executive: Ji main keh raha tha sir ki aapki services hum log sir run kar rahe hain. Sir aapki mail aayi thi ek hum logon ke paas mein. Kya dikkat aa rahi hai sir aise kya problem aa. Kya dikkat hai sir is. Haan ji haan ji haan ji.
Customer: Sir humein paise ki zarurat hai. Sir ji aap se maine ek bhi kaam band kar rahe hain. Sir ji mere paas hum logon ke yahan agar maine aap se baat to kiya tha na. Sir aisi agar koi bhi policy hoti to main kara deta na sir. Nahi hai agar main service band kara doon to bhi paisa refund nahi ho payega to band kyun karna hai. Meri meri baat suno. Service band karo ya na karo aaj kal ke aaj tak ke record hai government ka ki agar koi bhi banda tumhare ko payment return nahi karta hai. Uske liye kanuni karwai hai aapko nahi karni hai koi baat nahi. To sir kanuni karwai hai to main ye kahan keh raha hun. Kanuni karwai aisi kahan pe hai sir ki humne koi aap se galat paisa le liya hai jo ki nahi de rahe hain sir kanuni karwai hai. Mere ko mere ko kisi cheez ka koi mere ko cheez ki zarurat nahi hai. Theek hai main dukaan pe jaata hun samaan wapis ho jaata hai. Theek hai.
Executive: Sir ye samaan nahi hai na ye samaan nahi hai humne aapka promotion kiya aapki visibility ki aapka presence create kiya. Hamare paas bhi vendors hain. Vendors ko humne aapke agreement ke accordingly payment. Nahi hua hai. Main kyun karun kaam aap se. Sir tab use kariye service agar aap hamare platform ko. Sir tab hamare platform ko agar aap se hamare ko koi fayda hi nahi ho raha aapke platform ka to main usko chaatu. Ye batao. Sir pehle sir ji pehle platform use to karenge tab to fayda hoga tab use hi nahi karenge to kaise fayda hoga. Use to kar rahe hain aur isse chaar saal se platform use kar rahe hain. Sir 90 days haan. To sir chaar saal se agar aap hamara platform use kar rahe hain. To sir chaar saal mein jab aapne renewal kara to us samay aapko kuch benefit hua hoga tabhi to aapne karaya hoga na. Aapke aap logon ne jab mere ko plan diya tha baatein kuch aur thi. Abhi aapki tone alag hai aur main aap se bata raha hun agar aapne nahi karne sahi tarike se aaram se paise wapis to koi baat nahi. To main aur sir aap IndiaMART pe. Mere ko koi dikkat nahi.
Customer: Bolo bolo bolo.
Executive: Sir aap IndiaMART pe itne time se hain aur sir matlab aapko business mein loss hua kuch fayda nahi hai to sir IndiaMART pe paisa aap ek cheez samajhiye IndiaMART se paisa wapas kar de sir IndiaMART bhi aapka paisa leti hai to aage invest karti hai na vendors ke alag alag processes hain wahan pe hain. Agar aap agar aap main mentally retire hun is time samjho meri baat suno bahut zyada upset hun. Samajh gaye. Agar aapko meri baat nahi manni hai koi baat nahi. Main complaint karunga ki mere ko aise aise paise ki zarurat hai mera paisa inke paas hai ye mere ko wapis nahi de rahe seedhi si baat hai. Sir wo complaint kar sakte hain. Aap ye to koi baat nahi hai mere ko aap apna wakeel ka kharcha bhi aapke paas se lena padega wo mere paas paise hi nahi hain main kahan se doon. Agar aap nahi sahi tarike se aate baat to koi baat nahi hai main to aap se aaram se maang raha hun bhaiya mere paise wapis. Sir ji agar humne jo service di kahi kahi bhi koi bhi insaniyat agar aapki company mein insaniyat ke naam ki koi cheez hi nahi hai. Agar kisi insaan ki baat aap maante hi nahi ho to usse fayda kya hai. Mere ko kya karna hai aisi online pe mere ko to phir offline hi theek hai. Agar main jaata hun kisi ke paas se payment lene usko bol deta hun bhai mere ko payment ki zarurat hai agla apne aap de deta hai. Agar wo mere paas aata hai lene ke liye to main de deta hun. Sir product aur service. Main kya karun aise online ko chaatunga kya. Sir product aur services mein difference hota hai na please samjhiye. Yaar service mein kya hai jab tak li li nahi li nahi li bas baat khatam aapke paas mera paisa wapis hai band kar do service. Jitne din ki utna paisa kaat ke wapis de do usme kya hai. Sir sir agar ek baat batao aap din ka paisa kaat ke mere ko wapis de do kyun nahi de rahe ho. Sir agar aisa aap nahi samajhna chahte mat samjho koi baat nahi hai. Agar koi aapka senior hai to baat kara do agar nahi senior hai tab bata do ki hum payment nahi denge kyunki mere paas aapki jitni bhi hai abhi tak ki saari A to Z recording padi hai. Aaj ki bhi recording padi hai. Sir recording hai to recording mein kya hai recording mein kya bola gaya tha ki hum aapka paisa wapas ka recording mein yahi to bola ja raha hai na sir ki hamare paas policy. Aapke paisa wapis to bata do mere ko mere se zyada. Sir ji paise ke hamare paas koi policy nahi hai sir. Paise ki policies nahi hai sir isme. Are bhaiya aap use kariye service hum support karenge. Jab mere ko paas paise nahi hai main kaam hi band kar raha hun. To main kya karunga aapki service use lekar ke. Aaj tak kabhi koi fayda hua hai mere batao kitna business diya aapne mere ko. Aapne koi business diya hai mere ko batao aise bekar bekar si callen aati rehti kisi ne ek piece lena hai kisi ne aadha piece lena hai. Kisi ne bhaincho motorcycle ka chimta lena hota bhaincho mere ko phone kar deta hai. Main kya karun batao. Main to pehle hi apne dimag kharab ho rakha mera. Mere ko business mein loss hua hai maine aap se paise lene hain. Aap mere ko paise nahi de rahe. Humne pehle hi bola tha ki agar mere ko service theek nahi mili to main apna refund le lunga. Kab kahan aapko aisa likh ke diya gaya tha sir aisa koi document hai. Bhai sahab aap na meri baat suno rate rataye question mat bar bar put karo. Aur jo main aapko bol raha hun meri baat seedhi aur simple tarike se samajh mein aati hai theek hai. Nahi possible hai sir mere ko senior se baat kara dena. Theek hai main baat kara dunga. Agar ye aapke bas mein nahi hai to theek hai senior se baat kara. Ye to khair jo main bol raha hun sir ye main IndiaMART ke behalf pe bol raha hun main apne to mera decision making nahi hai IndiaMART ki policies hi main bataunga main apne personal koi policies thodi bataunga main jo bhi baat karunga IndiaMART ke behalf se baat karunga but theek hai main apne senior se bhi baat kara dunga aapko. Agar aapko lagta hai to. Baat yahi hai aap rate rataye yahi hai aapke paas question answer hai to koi baat nahi mere ko kisi se baat karao jisko meri baat samajh mein aa jaye. Nahi to sir hum legal action lenge koi baat nahi. Koi nahi sir uske liye hum tumhare kehne se bhi aap rukenge nahi agar jo aapko karna hoga wo to aap karenge hi lekin filhal main yahi bolunga sir ki agar service use karna hai. Yaar maine aapki baat sunni nahi hai. Aapke paas koi senior banda hai to meri baat kara do aapke paas baat karne ko. Main update karta hun theek hai main karta hun.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a refund for the subscription.

- Customer is not getting business from IndiaMART.

- Customer is facing financial issues.



Resolution:

- Executive explained that refund is not possible.

- Executive offered to connect with a senior.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect the customer to senior.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, business, loss
